text: Possilpark & Parkhouse is a Railway station in the north of Glasgow, Scotlandâ€™s largest city. The station is formed of 2 platforms with platform 1 serving passengers to the busy terminus of Glasgow Queen Street station and platform 2 serving passengers to the station of Anniesland. Service tends to be 1tph however this can sometimes be doubled during peak times. The line is a diesel operated line frequently used by the Class 156, Class 158 and Class 170 units owned by Scotrail. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Scotland Category:Buildings and structures in Glasgow
title: Possilpark & Parkhouse railway station
